description: This file is the entry point for a React-based frontend application. It imports React, ReactDOM, a CSS stylesheet, and the main App component. It initializes the root element and renders the App component inside StrictMode.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React elements into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the root DOM element.
